message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected 50/50, I'll try to take the lead
You're trying to take the lead, but I'll try to catch up!
You want to catch up, but I'll try to pull ahead
You're getting ahead, but I'll try to make a comeback!
You're trying to come back, but I'm not letting up yet
You're getting too aggressive, I'll try to make a last stand!
You're making a last stand, but I'm going for the win
You're close to winning, but I'll try to squeeze out a little more!
I'm not leaving anything for you, it's all mine now
You think you can take it all, but I'll try to get something!
It's now or never, I'll take 99.99%
